Description: Shred and Whammy with PrestigeThe Ibanez Prestige RG752 solidbody electric is one killer 7-string guitar. It all starts with the distinctively sculpted, resonant, and beautifully balanced basswood RG body, which is primed for players with attitude. That's you, right? For outstanding shredability, the Prestige RG752 gives you an alarmingly fast Wizard-7 Prestige neck and a flatter-then Kansas rosewood fingerboard with 24 jumbo frets. Turn up the heat with this guitar's outstanding DiMarzio humbucking pickups, custom-designed for down tuning. Get your hands on the magnificent Ibanez Prestige RG752 and prepare to shred!Ibanez Prestige RG752 7-string Solidbody Electric Guitar at a Glance:Wicked-fast Wizard-7 Prestige neckExtra expression from the Lo-Pro Edge 7 bridgeStep up to the top-of-the-line RG Prestige SeriesWicked-fast Wizard-7 Prestige neckIbanez put production 7-string guitars on the map, largely thanks to the effortless playability of their Wizard II-7 neck. The RG752 Prestige takes that 7-string mojo to the max! The RGD2127FX's wicked-fast Wizard-7 Prestige neck lets you execute lighting-fast runs, arpeggios, and hammer-ons with silken ease, but it still gives you the substance you need for comfortable chording.Extra expression from the Lo-Pro Edge 7 bridgeYou can divebomb with confidence on the RG752, thanks to its Lo-Pro Edge 7 bridge. It's one of the most comfortable vibrato units around, with a streamlined profile and recessed fine-tuners. Locking studs help maximize the tuning stability. If you play your guitar emphatically like some of us here at Sweetwater, you'll be glad you have this bridge!Step up to the top-of-the-line RG Prestige SeriesIbanez's RG Prestige Series is filled with top instruments - all featuring the famous RG body style, with excellent components through and through. With the RG752, you get a well-balanced, resonant basswood body plus a lightning-fast Wizard-7 Prestige neck with a rosewood fingerboard. It's a time-tested recipe for hard-hitting rock/metal/fusion tone and playability.Ibanez Prestige RG752 7-string Solidbody Electric Guitar Features:Distinctively sculpted, resonant, and beautifully balanced basswood RG bodyLightning-fast Wizard-7 Prestige neckRosewood fretboard with 24 jumbo frets and pearl dot inlaysDiMarzio PAF-7 pickups serve up sweet classic humbucker toneLo-Pro Edge 7 vibrato bridge/tailpiece delivers maximum whammy with ultra stabilityHardshell case included
Title: Ibanez RG752-CBM Prestige
ConditionDescription: Guitar is in MINT condition only played at home a couple of times and used for recording. Not a single ding or blemish. Pristine condition. Action is super low, and neck is really fast and comfortable for a 7 string.
